content: little kitty crochet pattern materials - worsted yarn i use simply soft purple/red - polyester fiber filling - tapestry needle and stitch marker - one pair of 9mm safety eyes hook size 3 5mm e hook terms single_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch fo = fasten_off/finish chain = chain st = stitch bsc = back loop only single_crochet decrease = decrease / make 1 single_crochet over next two stitches increase = increase / make 2 single_crochet on the same stitch approx 3 5 tall ^^ let s begin with kitty color here i use purple … chain 10+1 total 11 chains round 1 *1sc* 9 times *3sc* in next chain turn to other side of chain and continue with *1sc* 8 times then *2sc* last slip_stitch to the first single_crochet to form a round chain 1 total 22 single_crochet stitches round 2 make 1 single_crochet in each stitch then slip_stitch to the first single_crochet chain 1 total 22sts round 3 *1sc* in each stitch for next 10 sts *2c* in next stitch *1sc* in each stitch for next 10 sts then *2sc* in the last stitch do not slip_stitch put the stitch marker at the last single_crochet stitch total 24 sts *** starting next round do not slip_stitch do continues rounds until indicated *** round 4 repeat *1 single_crochet 1sc 1sc 2sc in next stitch* 6 times total 30 sts move your marker round 5 6 7 8 9 make 1sc in each stitch total 30 sts move your marker round 10 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc over next 2 st decrease * 6 times total 24 move marker round 11 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc over next 2sts decrease * 6 times total 18 move marker *** now is good time to put in the safety eyes between round 7/8 six stitches apart *** round 12 repeat *1sc 1sc over next 2 sts decrease * 6 times total 12 move marker neck… round 13 repeat *1sc 1sc 2sc in next stitch* 4 times total 16 sts move marker round 14 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc in next stitch* 4 times total 20 move marker *** stuff the head with fiber-poly filling *** body round 15 make 1 single_crochet in each stitch around total 20 move marker round 16 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc in next stitch* 4 times total 24 move marker *** to make tail on the right side do this part *** round 17r make 1 single_crochet in each next 6 stitches then repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc in next st * 2 times then make 1 single_crochet in each next 6 stitches total 26 move marker round 18r do 1sc 5 times 2sc in next stitch *1sc 6 times 2sc in next stitch* 2 times then do 1sc 5 times with 2sc in last stitch total 30 sts move marker *** to make tail on the left side do this part *** round 17l do *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc in next
